title: Hotspot only if Pixel 4 connected to WiFi
content:
I can only start a Hotspot on my phone when I am at home connected to WiFi.
The second I leave my home network it turns off. If I try to start a Hotspot when not connected to WiFi I am given the notice to 'call customer service to subscribe'
After hours of service calls it hasn't fixed the problem, but I am assured I do have 10gb of Hotspot data.

I have service through StraightTalk on the Verizon sim
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
